Serving patients at OSF Saint Francis Medical Center and UnityPoint Health – Methodist , our fellows receive an intensive training experience, and many opportunities to work closely with our expert faculty and staff. ACGME-Accredited Fellowships Internal Medicine Cardiovascular Diseases Gastroenterology Hospice & Palliative Medicine Pulmonary Critical Care Radiology Neuroradiology  UICOMP fellowships which the ACGME has no accreditation process: Radiology Breast Imaging Family Medicine Family Medicine Obstetrics Emergency Medicine Simulation Emergency Medicine Ultrasound Graduate Medical Education (GME) Residency Programs Fellowships Our Staff Resources Education About  Education  Research  Patient Care  Departments  News  Giving INFORMATION FOR: Prospective Students  Current Students  Faculty & Staff  Alumni & Friends  Patients RESOURCES: UIC Directory  Blackboard  Event Calendar  Emergency Information  Contact Us  Apply Now  Give  Contact Us Connect with us!
